    public static class ChartFragment.DataRange
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a data range an axis will display.

      • getDataRange

        public static ChartFragment.DataRange getDataRange(LogViewModel model,
                                                   ExerciseCompleteFragment.VerticalData dataType,
                                                   boolean getMaxValue,
                                                   boolean getMinValue)
        Returns a new DataRange.
        Parameters:
        model - the viewmodel
        dataType - the type of data
        getMaxValue - should the set's max value or 0 be used as the range's max value?
        getMinValue - should the set's min value or 0 be used as the range's min value?
        Returns:
        a new DataRange

        Parameters:
